content.html: I have some personal news 👀 Today is my last day at Google! 🛫🏝🌅 I am leaving to take a long break from full-time employment and explore different ways Open Source maintainers can get paid. I want to make words.filippo.io/professional-m… a thing, starting with Go cryptography!
content.value:
I have some personal news 👀

Today is my last day at Google! 🛫🏝🌅

I am leaving to take a long break from full-time employment and explore different ways Open Source maintainers can get paid.

I want to make words.filippo.io/professional-m… a thing, starting with Go cryptography!

photo.alt: A drawing of a gopher holding a sword on a grey background.
